caption.title: Projections for locations of protected areas calculated with the PRION software for São Miguel Island for the 1961–90 and 2080–99 periods for All Taxonomic groups with emphasis on the SIE species, and the current protected areas.
caption.p: Minimum Set—quasi-optimal solution that minimized the protected number of cells while protecting the same average proportion of each species’ range. Maximum Coverage—the optimal solution that maximized species coverage with similar costs.
